EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Test Automation for Beginners - English - 2015.07.28.Email - Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Test Automation for Beginners – Register Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Test Automation for Beginners
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Don’t forget to register for our upcoming webinar, “Test Automation for Beginners”!
Testers today deal with the same unanswered questions:
- How do I know which tests are the right tests? - Do these tests cover enough of my business risk? - How many test cases are enough? - Manual or automated testing?
In our newest webinar, Roman Zednik from the Tricentis Pre-Sales Consulting team will show you the basics of test automation, starting with the current market outlook on software test automation and ending with end-to-end test automation over different technologies.
Register now for the free webinar on July 28th, 2015 at 5 p.m. CEST! See you there! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/webinar-test-automation-for-beginners-20150728?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/webinar-test-automation-for-beginners-20150728?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Tue, Jul 28, 2015 5:00 p.m. – 6:00 p.m. CEST 11:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m. EDT
Roman Zednik Pre-Sales Consultant Tricentis
